channel.title: Monsters help, easy fix! DELTA
channel.description: I'm coding my delta, and I've noticed that a level 40 can kill a Lesser demon, which is level 82. I lost about 25 hp fighting the lesser and I did not die.. How can I make the demon or any npc more aggressive? And it's already aggressive as in you get close and it attacks you. What I mean by aggressive is hit you higher amounts of damage.

item.title: Monsters help, easy fix! DELTA
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

NPCHandler class, search for the existing boss monsters and add your own respectively.

Read full topic
